pr_title: Introduce Http execution context in kotlin runtime module

timeline.message:
Introduce Http execution context in kotlin runtime module

- Provide API to set Http headers per request via `HttpExecutionContext.Request`
- Provide access to raw Http execution response status code and headers via `HttpExecutionContext.Response`

Part of https://github.com/apollographql/apollo-android/issues/2222

Introduce Http execution context in kotlin runtime module

- Provide API to set Http headers per request via `HttpExecutionContext.Request`
- Provide access to raw Http execution response status code and headers via `HttpExecutionContext.Response`

Part of https://github.com/apollographql/apollo-android/issues/2222
Fix extracting http headers for iOS + test

timeline.bodyText: Should this be renamed to HttpError instead?
timeline.author: tasomaniac
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2,6 +2,10 @@ package com.apollographql.apollo
 
 sealed class ApolloError {
   object SerializationError : ApolloError()
+
   object ParseError : ApolloError()
+
   object Network : ApolloError()
+
+  data class Http(val statusCode: Int, val headers: Map<String, String>) : ApolloError()

timeline.message: Feedback remove `ApolloError`, make `ApolloException` as sealed class.
